email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address format such as yourname@email.com.

wallet.minlength: The wallet address you entered is incomplete, please check this field and try again.
wallet.invalid: The wallet address you entered is invalid. Please make sure you are using only alphanumeric characters.

metamask-install.title: Hello!
metamask-install.p1: To enter BitGuild, you must install MetaMask - a digital wallet for your browser.
metamask-install.p2: This will also act as your login to the BitGuild Portal (no extra passwords!).

metamask-login.title: You are not logged into MetaMask
metamask-login.p1: Please open MetaMask and follow the instructions to log in.

metamask-network.title: Sorry!
metamask-network.p1: This network is not supported by BitGuild portal. For actual experience please switch to main net. For testing purposes please use Rinkeby

register.title: Welcome to BitGuild
register.n1: Make sure you save your MetaMask login information and account recovery details! We can’t help you recover it if you lose access.
register.text:
BitGuild requires all users to sign with their private key in order to safeguard against spoofing attempts.

Our mission is to revolutionize the global gaming industry by creating a platform for a brand new class of games that live on the blockchain. Blockchain games completely redefine the relationship between players and developers by facilitating full and true ownership of in-game assets, cheap & safe item trading, cross-game compatibility of items & currency, and more. BitGuild’s team consists of cryptocurrency and gaming veterans with decades of experience building international large-scale gaming platforms and communities. BitGuild aims to host the best blockchain games and the largest blockchain gamer community online.

sell-feature-coming.title: Stay tuned!
sell-feature-coming.p1: We will let you know as soon as you are able to sell items.

link-wallet.link-wallet: Link new wallet to your account?

bugbounty.title: Bug Bounty
bugbounty.info: Are you a curious developer looking to learn more about smart contracts? Or maybe you are a well versed engineer with smart contract experience? Either way, we’re inviting you to participate in our bug bounty program and help us make our products rock solid, and our contracts ironclad.
bugbounty.conditions-1: The program covers only bugs in any of our smart contracts for Marketplace and Bitizens.
bugbounty.conditions-2: At the moment, those contracts are written in Solidity for Ethereum blockchain so the program targets this ecosystem only.
bugbounty.conditions-3: Whoever reports the bug first, gets the reward (see the submission process below). Github issue date will be used as proof.
bugbounty.rewards-info-1: Severity 0 - User funds or items are at risk of having unauthorized access by another user.
bugbounty.rewards-info-2: Severity 1 - User state (equipped items, placed orders, etc) is risk of being changed by unauthorized user.
bugbounty.rewards-info-3: Severity 2 - BitGuild funds/items/state is at risk of being changed by unauthorized user.
bugbounty.rewards-info-4: Severity 3 - Any major bug in the product logic that significantly changes its behavior.
bugbounty.report-header: To submit a report, please do the following:
bugbounty.report-1: Create a github issue in the relevant repo (see the links above).
bugbounty.processing: We will acknowledge receival of your submission within 72 hours , and we’ll commit to validating the report, giving you our conclusion within 10 days .
bugbounty.looking-forward: We are looking forward to hearing from you!

inventory.title: My Items
inventory.faq: Learn more about items in FAQ

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.empty: No items are listed for sale right now, check back later!

metamask.title: Metamask
metamask.a1: It’s a browser plug-in that connects your digital ethereum wallet to the Portal. For a step-to-step tutorial on how to set up a Metamask account, please check this helpful guide.
metamask.q2: Do I really need to use metamask?
metamask.a2: For now, the only supported way of using the BitGuild Portal involves MetaMask. We are open to integrating functionality for other Ethereum-enabled browser wallets in the future.
metamask.q3: I can’t see my PLAT in my wallet! Where is it?
metamask.a3: If you’re using MetaMask, you need enable the BETA UI, and manually add the PLAT token to your token list. Use this address when configuring: 0x7E43581b19ab509BCF9397a2eFd1ab10233f27dE (specify 18 for digits).
metamask.q4: Does registering with my private key on the BitGuild Portal have a transaction fee?
metamask.a4: No, only transactions sent through your MetaMask Wallet will have a gas fee.

plat.title: PLAT Tokens
plat.a1: PLAT is the official BitGuild Token, used within the BitGuild ecosystem to play games, trade items, and more! It’s the driving currency on the BitGuild portal, usable in all current and future games on BitGuild.
plat.a2: Registered BitGuild users can buy PLAT via the converter on the top right bar of the BitGuild Portal.
plat.q3: Are there any games that I can play without PLAT?
plat.a3: Most games will accept only PLAT, though some may accept ETH as well. In this event, using PLAT will always garner a discount for the player. However, some titles may also present users with a free-to-play model, offering players a way to try the game without buying anything.
plat.q4: What is the ETH to PLAT exchange rate?
plat.a4: The most up to date exchange rate will be shown in the converter.

games.title: BitGuild Games
games.q1: Can I play any of these games on mobile?
games.a1: If the game supports mobile play, you can use any of the mobile wallets with Ethereum-enabled browsers, such as Trust Wallet to play the games on the BitGuild Portal.
games.q2: I’ve played a 3rd party game outside of BitGuild.com, and now I want to play it through the BitGuild portal. Is that possible?
games.a2: Yes. If the game is available on BitGuild.com, but you’ve played it elsewhere before, all your items and progress will be preserved as long as you sign up to BitGuild.com with the same wallet address you used to play the game previously.

items.title: Game Items
items.q1: How can I trade and sell my items?
items.a1: The BitGuild Marketplace is under development. In the meantime, you are free to use any existing marketplace for the ERC721 tokens.
items.q2: Can I trade outside the portal?
items.a2: Yes, you are free to use any existing marketplace for the ERC721 tokens.
items.q3: How can I report an issue with the Portal or a game?
items.a3: You can email us at support@bitguild.com, or you can reach the BitGuild Team and Player community on Discord!
items.q4: How can I see the items that I have so far?
items.a4: You can see the items for all the games that live on the BitGuild Portal on the “My Items” section, found on the top menu bar.
items.q5: I have an item that is missing. Who can I report this to?
items.a5: Send us an email at support@bitguild.com, or find us on Discord, and we’ll do our best to sort the situation out.
items.q6: I’d like to report a scammer
items.a6: Contact support@bitguild.com, and please include as much supporting information as you can, including screenshots.
items.q7: I’d like to report an item bug.
items.a7: Contact support@bitguild.com, and please include as much supporting information as you can, including screenshots.
items.q8: How long does a purchase transaction take?
items.a8: Each transaction, either purchasing or gifting, can take from 30 seconds up to a few minutes, depending on the gas price you selected in MetaMask.
items.q9: What if my transaction is not going through?
items.a9: If a transaction is not going through, MetaMask allows you to increase the gas price for the pending transactions. Transactions get queued, so if one of the previous transactions is stuck, all of the following will be stuck as well.
items.q10: How much does each transaction cost (gas price)?
items.a10: You can set your gas price through MetaMask. Actual gas spend varies depending on the game and type of transaction.

account.title: My Account
account.q1: What is my BitGuild login information?
account.a1: Users sign into BitGuild.com using their MetaMask credentials.
account.q2: I’m having trouble signing in. What can I do?
account.a2: Double check your MetaMask login info, and ensure there are no conflicting issues. If you are still having trouble, contact us at support@bitguild.com, or find us directly on Discord.
account.q3: I forgot my BitGuild name and password. How can I retrieve it?
account.a3: BitGuild doesn’t use traditional login info - everything is tied to MetaMask. If you’ve lost your MetaMask credentials, we unfortunately can’t help you. :(

community.title: BitGuild Community
community.q1: How can I engage with other players?
community.a1: While BitGuild features an integrated chat system, you can also find the BitGuild community on Discord. There, you can chat with other players, as well as keep up with news from the BitGuild team and 3rd party developers.
community.q2: Where can I find BitGuild on social media?
community.a2: You can find us on Twitter, Facebook, Telegram, Reddit, and of course, Discord!

developers.title: Game Developers
developers.q1: I’m interested in developing a game for BitGuild. Who can I contact?
developers.a1: Reach out to us via email at: partnerships@bitguild.com

about.tagline: Find the greatest blockchain gaming experiences, all in one place.
about.body: BitGuild's mission is to redefine the standard for how players interact with their games by facilitating true item ownership—You're free to buy, sell, or trade game assets at your leisure! The days of digital locks on your cards and swords are over!

events.giveaway-over: Ether Online Free Item Giveaway Winners!

events.title: Hail Guildmates,
events.p1: Welcome to the <strong> final opportunity to obtain a pet in Ether Online <strong> outside of trading for it on the marketplace!
events.p2: We’ve got some pets to give away. These pets are unique in that they <strong> increase your Ether Online character stats by a flat %<strong>—the only type of item in the game to do so! Needless to say, players with one of these rare pets are at a serious advantage.
events.p3: To participate in any of the below events, you must first register your MetaMask account on www.bitguild.com, and <strong>have a minimum of 1000 PLAT<strong> in your wallet.
events.p4: Now, to find out how to get your mitts on one of these cute animal friends, read on!
events.p5: <strong>Warbear:<strong> Community Discord Contest! Jump into the Guild Hall and meet your fellow Guildmates, interact with the team, and keep up with all the latest news from BitGuild!
events.l1: <strong>Join the official BitGuild Discord Server, and reach level 3+<strong>. Gain experience and level up by participating in conversations with the community! Please be constructive and don’t spam.**
events.l2: <strong>Fill this form<strong> to confirm your entry into the giveaway once you meet the criteria.
events.l3: One lucky winner will win the elusive <strong>Warbear<strong>, and <strong>10 additional people will win 20 Item Chests each!<strong>
events.l4: Winner will be selected at random from users meeting the criteria. We will email you, so <strong>keep an eye on your inbox around June 28th, 2018!*<strong>
events.p6: <strong> Royal Eagle:<strong> Fan art contest! Spread your creative wings by creating some fan art! This should take the form of a static image such as a wallpaper, or an animated .gif.
events.l5: We invite you to submit your content to us! We want to see what our community can do when posed with a creative challenge!
events.l6: Images should be <strong>BitGuild or Ether Online themed<strong>, and inoffensive. Beyond that, it’s up to you. Extra points for effort, and “thinking outside the block”.
events.l7: Once you’ve completed your masterpiece, <strong>fill out this form<strong> to send us your work to confirm your entry!
events.l8: On July 2nd 2018, BitGuild will select the finalists, and you’ll all get a chance to vote for your favorite on the official BitGuild Discord Server! The winner will become the proud new owner of the <strong>Royal Eagle<strong>, and <strong>5 runners up stand to win 50 Item Chests each!<strong>
events.l9: Winners will be contacted via email. Keep your eyes on your inbox!*
events.p7: <strong>Raging Tiger:<strong> BitGuild on the web! Help us spread the word and grow the guild by sharing our content on various platforms!
events.l10: Click here, and <strong>follow the instructions for your chance to win the Raging Tiger<strong>. The more tasks you complete, the higher your chance to win - <strong>additionally, 50 random participants will receive 5 item chests each!<strong>
events.l11: Check your email on June 25th, 2018, to see if you’ve won!
events.p8: *If a user does not reply to our message within 24 hours, BitGuild reserves the right to select a new winner at random.
events.p9: Contribution should not be spam, low effort, offensive, or duplicate content. Play nice!

bitizens.title: Bitizens Pioneers Pre-Sale
bitizens.subtitle: Show your support, and get unique in-game items in return!
bitizens.bonus-reward-1-description: Once 30% of all Bitizens pre-sale items are sold, every participant will be the proud new owner of a unique Dril’r Bot Pioneer-I paint job!
bitizens.bonus-reward-2-description: Selling 70% of all Bitizens pre-sale items will unlock something extra special for all participants - Your very own miniature rocket!
bitizens.dividing-text: We’ve set up some unique stretch goals as well (see above for details!). Reaching them will unlock unique items for all pre-sale participants - an extra special reward for helping us make the Bitizen vision a reality.
bitizens.drillrbot-text-1: Once 30% of all Bitizens pre-sale items are sold, every participant will be the proud new owner of a unique Dril’r Bot Pioneer-I paint job!
bitizens.drillrbot-text-2: That’s right, this adorable little mining companion is now an ERC721 token - meaning it can be customized! First up on the list of possible ways players can customize their personal Dril’ rBot are paint jobs, and the one featured here is going to be pretty special (Once the pre-sale is over, that’s it, you can’t get it anymore!).
bitizens.rocket-text-1: Selling 70% of all Bitizens pre-sale items will unlock something extra special for all participants - Your very own miniature rocket!
bitizens.rocket-text-2: The Mini-Rocket is an Accessory item-type, meaning it can be equipped to your character and offer either special visual effects on your Bitizen, or a stat boost, or both! Much like the first bonus item, this Mini Rocket is not going to be available once the Bitizens pre-sale is over!
bitizens.final-text: Join us as we bring our love for online games to the blockchain with Bitizens!

description-text.p1: Get your mitts on the exclusive items below by participating in our pre-sale event. This will be the ONLY chance at securing these items for yourself - Don’t miss out as quantities are limited!
description-text.p2: Taking part in the Bitizens pre-sale will not only help us produce a quality game that caters to players first and foremost, offering deep, meaningful, and engaging blockchain gaming experiences - It will also help show off your status as a Pioneer of both Bitizens and the BitGuild Portal.
description-text.p3: Once the game launches, these special, limited run items can't be acquired by traditional in-game means; You'd have to trade for them!
description-text.p4: Check out the Pioneer sets available and secure your piece of cryptogaming history, and establish yourself as a Bitizens Pioneer today!

faq-text.p1: Your invitation to come and make the world a better place.
faq-text.p2: Welcome to Bitropolis - the ultimate destination for a new crypto world!
faq-text.p3: Visit this sprawling cityscape and enjoy everything it has to offer, from the sunny digital skies to the depths of the bitmines. Everyone is welcome, all you have to do is sign up - Your digital cognition will then be loaded into your new destination in a matter of mere clicks!
faq-text.p5: Oh it’s no big deal, it’s just the single most magnificent digital civilization this side of the blockchain (probably even the other side too… but we don’t go there.) It’s a sprawling, unending urban jungle in which your wildest dreams can come true - provided you wanna hit the big time in the world of crypto! Experience unlimited possibilities as you set forth on your journey to this new interconnected virtual utopia.
faq-text.p7: Anyone you like! You, and anyone else making a stop in Beautiful Bitropolis is an honorary Bitizen! In this realm, you can customize your pretty polygonal face, and let everyone know what you’re all about by accessorizing to your heart’s content.
faq-text.p8: Well that’s nice… but why should I stay?!
faq-text.p9: Prosperity of course! Once you see it for yourself, you’ll be an instant believer - Bitropolis is just THE place to be! It’s a world rich with opportunity for all, and here, everyone is on equal grounds from the get-go. Refusing Bitropolis residency is like using your bitcoins to buy a pizza in 2010 - not very smart!
faq-text.p11: Every single Bitizen is granted a standard issue, slightly used, Dril’rBot Rx-24. With this trusty little excavator at your side, you can delve into the veritable cornucopia of treasure that are the Bitropolis Mines. Drill to your heart’s content, because anything you find can be exchanged for sweet rewards at the foundry!
faq-text.p13: Bask in the glory, flaunt your swag by adorning yourself in rare and unique threads, and then do it all again! There’s no end to what you can find down there, and any and all items acquired in Bitropolis are yours to keep, use, trade, or even sell for PLAT! Who knows what you might find… It could be just what you needed to complete your collection… or your neighbour’s collection (provided you’re willing to sell it to them... Did someone say profits? KA-CHING!)
faq-text.p14: Sounds amazing! How do I get there?
faq-text.p15: You can book your one-way ticket (let’s face it, you won’t need the return ticket) to the virtual world of Bitropolis right now. There’s no such thing as an economy seat - For Bitizens, it’s first class all the way baby!

rules-text.l1: You cannot purchase the same set more than once.
rules-text.l2: Multiple purchases will only qualify you for one bonus reward of each tier.
rules-text.l3: These items will not be available after the pre-sale is complete.
rules-text.l4: Pioneer items will be allowed for sale on our Marketplace.
rules-text.l5: All pre-sale items are available for purchase using PLAT only.
rules-text.l7: Pioneer sets, items, and Bonus Rewards will be available to claim at the time of the Bitizen’s Wardrobe release, scheduled for late July.
rules-text.l8: You must claim your items on the account used to purchase the items.
rules-text.l9: Gas fees may apply at the time of in-game item redemption.

pioneer_of_the_wilds.name: Pioneer of the Wilds
pioneer_of_the_wilds.description: Always ready to seek new adventures, the explorer’s outfit will let people know you’re at the forefront of cryptogaming, and got here before it was cool!

pioneer_of_the_seas.name: Pioneer of the Seas
pioneer_of_the_seas.description: Go deeper than most could only dream of, and discover the untold secrets of an unexplored world.

pioneer_of_the_skies.name: Pioneer of the Skies
pioneer_of_the_skies.description: Fly above the radar in this stoic Flightsuit. You’ll turn some heads with pure envy if your Bitizen is spotted in this get-up - for sure!

pioneer_of_the_cyberscape.name: Cyberspace Pioneer
pioneer_of_the_cyberscape.description: Lock yourself in as the only Bitizen Cyber Warrior. You are one with the chain, and the chain is one with you.

pioneer_compass.name: Pioneer's Compass
pioneer_compass.description: This ancient compass always shows the way, but no one knows where to exactly. Some say it points to the long-lost heart of Bitropolis, others say it points to your innermost desires - Either way, it increases your chance to find something nice while mining!
